src:
NasDem Siap Bertemu, PAN Justru Janjian dengan PDIP
05 Nov 2019, 11:11 by Mochamad Zhacky
Jakarta - Partai Amanat Nasional (PAN) sedang mengatur waktu pertemuan dengan PDIP. Apa yang dibahas?
"Ya pertemuan dengan partai-partai itu biasa. Ini juga lagi di-arrange kita mau ketemu PDIP," kata Ketua Umum PAN Zulkifli Hasan (Zulhas) kepada wartawan di Kompleks MPR/DPR, Senayan, Jakarta, Selasa (5/11/2019).
Rencana pertemuan PAN dan PDIP menjadi menarik karena sebelumnya partai berlambang matahari itu justru diwacanakan bertemu dengan NasDem. Zulhas memastikan pertemuan dengan NasDem tetap akan digelar.
"Nanti dengan NasDem kan banyak UU yang akan dibahas nih. KUHP mau dibahas lagi, dengan UU Pertanahan, agraria yang menuai pro kontra. Tentu kita kan mesti menyamakan presepsi. Jadi perlulah silaturahmi," ungkap Zulhas.
Selain itu Zulhas mengungkapkan bahwa PAN juga akan bertemu Golkar. Dia menyebut PAN diundang ke acara puncak rapat pleno Golkar di Jakarta.
"Besok malam kan anu, Golkar ngundang kita. Jadi biasa," terangnya.
Sebelumnya diberitakan, NasDem mengungkap rencana bertemu PAN itu setelah perjumpaan dengan PKS. Pertemuan itu disebut berlangsung pada akhir November.
"Dengan PAN kami akan ketemu akhir November. Saya sudah berkomunikasi dengan Mas Eddy Soeparno," ujar Ketua DPP NasDem Willy Aditya di Kedai Sirih Merah, Kebon Sirih, Jakarta Pusat, Sabtu (2/11/2019).

(zak/imk)
text:
NasDem Ready to Meet, PAN Accords with PDIP
05 Nov 2019, 11:11 by Mochamad Zhacky
Jakarta - The National Mandate Party (PAN) is arranging a meeting time with PDIP. What was discussed?
"Yes, meetings with parties are normal. This is also arranged again, we want to meet PDIP," PAN Chairman Zulkifli Hasan (Zulhas) told reporters at the MPR / DPR Complex, Senayan, Jakarta, Tuesday (11/05/2019) ).
The planned meeting of the PAN and PDIP became interesting because previously the party bearing the sun had actually planned to meet with NasDem. Zulhas ensured that the meeting with NasDem would still be held.
"Later with NasDem, there will be a lot of laws that will be discussed here. The Criminal Code wants to be discussed again, with the Land Law, agrarian which reaps the pros and cons. Of course we must equalize the perception.
In addition, Zulhas revealed that PAN will also meet Golkar. He said PAN was invited to the summit of the Golkar plenary meeting in Jakarta.
"Tomorrow night, then, Golkar will invite us. So it's normal," he explained.
Previously reported, NasDem revealed plans to meet the PAN after the meeting with PKS. The meeting was said to take place at the end of November.
"With PAN we will meet at the end of November. I have already communicated with Mas Eddy Soeparno," said DPD NasDem Chairman Willy Aditya at Kedai Sirih Merah, Kebon Sirih, Central Jakarta, Saturday (11/02/2019).

(zak / imk)
